<!--- DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE. IT IS AUTOMATICALLY GENERATED. -->


Returns the length of the given leg.



```
legLen(hypotenuse: number, leg: number) -> number
```

### Examples

```kcl
legLen(5, 3)
```

### Arguments

* `hypotenuse`: `number` (REQUIRED)
* `leg`: `number` (REQUIRED)

### Returns

`number`
